title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus as expected.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, the focus caret does not move and remains unchanged.
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo field labeled 'Host:'.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the first Combo field labeled 'Host:'.
3. Click on the Combo field.
4. Check if the focus caret moves to the Combo field.
